headline: GE Aerospace Closes On Buy Point As Aerospace/Defense Stocks Rally
summary: GE Aerospace stock opened less than 1% below a buy point on Tuesday, as the Aerospace/Defense industry group came off its strongest day since January 21.  On Monday, the S&P 500 rallied 1.8%, the Nasdaq composite advanced 2.3%.  The 71 stocks in the Aerospace/Defense group collectively notched a 2.2% gain on Monday.
